Detailed Description

Model class for clicks to external URLs on the pages of website.

Objects of class Outbound model the event of a click on an external URL from a hyperlink located in the pages of the website. Those events are logged to database for statistical purposes.

Member Function Documentation

Outbound::init ( $  values = NULL  )  [protected]

Performs specialized initialization tasks.

Subclassers will use this method to perform custom initialization.

Note:
The default implementation simply does nothing.
Parameters:
values An array of column-value pairs to initialize the receiver.

Reimplemented from ActiveRecord.
